jobDescription: About Us Appirio, a Wipro Company helps customers create next-generation Worker and Customer Experiences using the latest cloud technologies. Our free-thinking consultants deliver unmatched customer value by creating actionable strategies, delivering results quickly, and helping organizations adapt to a new experience-driven era. We do this by harnessing the power of one of the world’s largest crowdsourcing communities and thousands of pre-built solution accelerators. Appirio is a trusted partner to some of the world’s largest brands, including YP, Cardinal Health, Coca-Cola, eBay, Facebook, Home Depot, Sony PlayStation, Moen, and IBM. Brief Summary of Role People have a habit of referring to you as “the Marketing Cloud guru.” You know your AmpScript from your Data Extensions and your Sender Authentication Packages from your Automation Studio. You’re comfortable not just talking solutions, but implementing them. You’re at your best when you’re answering tough questions about the product and then putting your answers into action--both on your own and with the support of other resources. You’re good at integrating the platform with other technologies, and data is your second language. Your skill with Salesforce Marketing Cloud is exceeded only by your passion for the product. Responsibilities Work with senior leadership of the Marketing Cloud Practice, Marketing/Business Architects and other consulting team members to design and implement Salesforce Marketing Cloud technical solutions. Lead teams of resources, both onshore and offshore, in executing tactics that lead to the successful launch of sophisticated, integrated Marketing Cloud solutions. Serve as a “platform expert” on all aspects of the Marketing Cloud for clients and internal resources alike.
